title: Reason why a Woman shouldn't be trusted directly anymore!
selftext:
It has become completely impossible for men to survive without cctv footages.

Context: A teenage girl in Khyala, West Delhi is claiming that she got assaulted by neighbours for feeding stray dogs. But now see the other side of the video.
